98

100  m_canvasRenderer = GetComponent<CanvasRenderer>();

103 
104  if (m_mesh == null)

334  // Event received when custom material editor properties are changed.
335  void ON_MATERIAL_PROPERTY_CHANGED(bool isChanged, Material mat)
336  {
337  //Debug.Log("ON_MATERIAL_PROPERTY_CHANGED event received."); // Targeted Material is: " + mat.name + " m_sharedMaterial: " + m_sharedMaterial.name + " with ID:" + m_sharedMaterial.GetInstanceID() + " m_renderer.sharedMaterial: " + m_canvasRenderer.GetMaterial() + " Masking Material:" + m_MaskMaterial.GetInstanceID());
338 
339  ShaderUtilities.GetShaderPropertyIDs(); // Initialize ShaderUtilities and get shader property IDs.
340 
341  int materialID = mat.GetInstanceID();
342  int sharedMaterialID = m_sharedMaterial.GetInstanceID();
343  int maskingMaterialID = m_MaskMaterial == null ? 0 : m_MaskMaterial.GetInstanceID();
344 
345  if (m_canvasRenderer == null || m_canvasRenderer.GetMaterial() == null)
346  {
347  if (m_canvasRenderer == null) return;
348 
349  if (m_fontAsset != null)
350  {
351  m_canvasRenderer.SetMaterial(m_fontAsset.material, m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex));
352  //Debug.LogWarning("No Material was assigned to " + name + ". " + m_fontAsset.material.name + " was assigned.");
353  }
354  else
355  Debug.LogWarning("No Font Asset assigned to " + name + ". Please assign a Font Asset.", this);
356  }
357 
358 
359  if (m_canvasRenderer.GetMaterial() != m_sharedMaterial && m_fontAsset == null) // || m_renderer.sharedMaterials.Contains(mat))
360  {
361  //Debug.Log("ON_MATERIAL_PROPERTY_CHANGED Called on Target ID: " + GetInstanceID() + ". Previous Material:" + m_sharedMaterial + " New Material:" + m_uiRenderer.GetMaterial()); // on Object ID:" + GetInstanceID() + ". m_sharedMaterial: " + m_sharedMaterial.name + " m_renderer.sharedMaterial: " + m_renderer.sharedMaterial.name);
362  m_sharedMaterial = m_canvasRenderer.GetMaterial();
363  }
364 
365 
366  // Make sure material properties are synchronized between the assigned material and masking material.
367  if (m_MaskMaterial != null)
368  {
369  UnityEditor.Undo.RecordObject(m_MaskMaterial, "Material Property Changes");
370  UnityEditor.Undo.RecordObject(m_sharedMaterial, "Material Property Changes");
371 
372  if (materialID == sharedMaterialID)
373  {
374  //Debug.Log("Copy base material properties to masking material if not null.");
375  float stencilID = m_MaskMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilID);
376  float stencilComp = m_MaskMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilComp);
377  //float stencilOp = m_MaskMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilOp);
378  //float stencilRead = m_MaskMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilReadMask);
379  //float stencilWrite = m_MaskMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilWriteMask);
380 
381  m_MaskMaterial.CopyPropertiesFromMaterial(mat);
382  m_MaskMaterial.shaderKeywords = mat.shaderKeywords;
383 
384  m_MaskMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilID, stencilID);
385  m_MaskMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilComp, stencilComp);
386  //m_MaskMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilOp, stencilOp);
387  //m_MaskMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilReadMask, stencilID);
388  //m_MaskMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilWriteMask, 0);
389  }
390  else if (materialID == maskingMaterialID)
391  {
392  // Update the padding
393  GetPaddingForMaterial(mat);
394 
395  m_sharedMaterial.CopyPropertiesFromMaterial(mat);
396  m_sharedMaterial.shaderKeywords = mat.shaderKeywords;
397  m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilID, 0);
398  m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilComp, 8);
399  //m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilOp, 0);
400  //m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilReadMask, 255);
401  //m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_StencilWriteMask, 255);
402  }
403 
404  }
405 
406  m_padding = GetPaddingForMaterial();
407  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
408  SetVerticesDirty();
409  //SetMaterialDirty();
410  }

509  // Function which loads either the default font or a newly assigned font asset. This function also assigned the appropriate material to the renderer.
510  protected override void LoadFontAsset()
511  {
512  //Debug.Log("***** LoadFontAsset() *****"); //TextMeshPro LoadFontAsset() has been called."); // Current Font Asset is " + (font != null ? font.name: "Null") );
513 
514  ShaderUtilities.GetShaderPropertyIDs(); // Initialize & Get shader property IDs.
515 
516  if (m_fontAsset == null)
517  {
518  if (TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset != null)
519  m_fontAsset = TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset;
520  else
521  m_fontAsset = Resources.Load<TMP_FontAsset>("Fonts & Materials/LiberationSans SDF");
522 
523  if (m_fontAsset == null)
524  {
525  Debug.LogWarning("The LiberationSans SDF Font Asset was not found. There is no Font Asset assigned to " + gameObject.name + ".", this);
526  return;
527  }
528 
529  if (m_fontAsset.characterLookupTable == null)
530  {
531  Debug.Log("Dictionary is Null!");
532  }
533 
534  m_sharedMaterial = m_fontAsset.material;
535  }
536  else
537  {
538  // Read font definition if needed.
539  if (m_fontAsset.characterLookupTable == null)
540  m_fontAsset.ReadFontAssetDefinition();
541 
542  // Added for compatibility with previous releases.
543  if (m_sharedMaterial == null && m_baseMaterial != null)
544  {
545  m_sharedMaterial = m_baseMaterial;
546  m_baseMaterial = null;
547  }
548 
549  // If font atlas texture doesn't match the assigned material font atlas, switch back to default material specified in the Font Asset.
550  if (m_sharedMaterial == null || m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex) == null || m_fontAsset.atlasTexture.GetInstanceID() != m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
551  {
552  if (m_fontAsset.material == null)
553  Debug.LogWarning("The Font Atlas Texture of the Font Asset " + m_fontAsset.name + " assigned to " + gameObject.name + " is missing.", this);
554  else
555  m_sharedMaterial = m_fontAsset.material;
556  }
557  }
558 
559 
560  // Find and cache Underline & Ellipsis characters.
561  GetSpecialCharacters(m_fontAsset);
562 
563  m_padding = GetPaddingForMaterial();
564 
565  SetMaterialDirty();
566  }
567 
568 
572  private Canvas GetCanvas()
573  {
574  Canvas canvas = null;
575  var list = TMP_ListPool<Canvas>.Get();
576 
577  gameObject.GetComponentsInParent(false, list);
578  if (list.Count > 0)
579  {
580  // Find the first active and enabled canvas.
581  for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; ++i)
582  {
583  if (list[i].isActiveAndEnabled)
584  {
585  canvas = list[i];
586  break;
587  }
588  }
589  }
590 
591  TMP_ListPool<Canvas>.Release(list);
592 
593  return canvas;
594  }

600  void UpdateEnvMapMatrix()
601  {
602  if (!m_sharedMaterial.HasProperty(ShaderUtilities.ID_EnvMap) || m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_EnvMap) == null)
603  return;
604 
605  //Debug.Log("Updating Env Matrix...");
606  Vector3 rotation = m_sharedMaterial.GetVector(ShaderUtilities.ID_EnvMatrixRotation);
607  m_EnvMapMatrix = Matrix4x4.TRS(Vector3.zero, Quaternion.Euler(rotation), Vector3.one);
608 
609  m_sharedMaterial.SetMatrix(ShaderUtilities.ID_EnvMatrix, m_EnvMapMatrix);
610  }

628

654  // Enable Masking in the Shader
655  void DisableMasking()
656  {
657  if (m_fontMaterial != null)
658  {
659  if (m_stencilID > 0)

664  m_canvasRenderer.SetMaterial(m_sharedMaterial, m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex));
665 
666  DestroyImmediate(m_fontMaterial);
667  }

669  m_isMaskingEnabled = false;

673  {
674  m_sharedMaterial = m_baseMaterial;
675  m_uiRenderer.SetMaterial(m_sharedMaterial, null);
676  }
677  else if (m_stencilID > 0)
678  {
679  m_sharedMaterial.EnableKeyword("MASK_OFF");

681  m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword("MASK_SOFT");

701  // Update & recompute Mask offset
702  void UpdateMask()
703  {
704  //Debug.Log("Updating Mask...");
705 
706  if (m_rectTransform != null)
707  {
708  //Material mat = m_uiRenderer.GetMaterial();
709  //if (mat == null || (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.ScrollRect && m_isScrollRegionSet))
710  // return;
711 
712  if (!ShaderUtilities.isInitialized)
713  ShaderUtilities.GetShaderPropertyIDs();
714 
715  //Debug.Log("Setting Mask for the first time.");
716 
717  m_isScrollRegionSet = true;
718 
719  float softnessX = Mathf.Min(Mathf.Min(m_margin.x, m_margin.z), m_sharedMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_MaskSoftnessX));
720  float softnessY = Mathf.Min(Mathf.Min(m_margin.y, m_margin.w), m_sharedMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_MaskSoftnessY));
721 
722  softnessX = softnessX > 0 ? softnessX : 0;
723  softnessY = softnessY > 0 ? softnessY : 0;
724 
725  float width = (m_rectTransform.rect.width - Mathf.Max(m_margin.x, 0) - Mathf.Max(m_margin.z, 0)) / 2 + softnessX;
726  float height = (m_rectTransform.rect.height - Mathf.Max(m_margin.y, 0) - Mathf.Max(m_margin.w, 0)) / 2 + softnessY;
727 
728 
729  Vector2 center = m_rectTransform.localPosition + new Vector3((0.5f - m_rectTransform.pivot.x) * m_rectTransform.rect.width + (Mathf.Max(m_margin.x, 0) - Mathf.Max(m_margin.z, 0)) / 2, (0.5f - m_rectTransform.pivot.y) * m_rectTransform.rect.height + (-Mathf.Max(m_margin.y, 0) + Mathf.Max(m_margin.w, 0)) / 2);
730 
731  //Vector2 center = m_rectTransform.localPosition + new Vector3((0.5f - m_rectTransform.pivot.x) * m_rectTransform.rect.width + (margin.x - margin.z) / 2, (0.5f - m_rectTransform.pivot.y) * m_rectTransform.rect.height + (-margin.y + margin.w) / 2);
732  Vector4 mask = new Vector4(center.x, center.y, width, height);
733  //Debug.Log(mask);
734 
735 
736 
737  //Rect rect = new Rect(0, 0, m_rectTransform.rect.width + margin.x + margin.z, m_rectTransform.rect.height + margin.y + margin.w);
738  //int softness = (int)m_sharedMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_MaskSoftnessX) / 2;
739  m_sharedMaterial.SetVector(ShaderUtilities.ID_ClipRect, mask);
740  }
741  }

744  // Function called internally when a new material is assigned via the fontMaterial property.
745  protected override Material GetMaterial(Material mat)
746  {
747  // Get Shader PropertyIDs if they haven't been cached already.
748  ShaderUtilities.GetShaderPropertyIDs();
749 
750  // Check in case Object is disabled. If so, we don't have a valid reference to the Renderer.
751  // This can occur when the Duplicate Material Context menu is used on an inactive object.
752  //if (m_canvasRenderer == null)
753  // m_canvasRenderer = GetComponent<CanvasRenderer>();
754 
755  // Create Instance Material only if the new material is not the same instance previously used.
756  if (m_fontMaterial == null || m_fontMaterial.GetInstanceID() != mat.GetInstanceID())
757  m_fontMaterial = CreateMaterialInstance(mat);
758 
759  m_sharedMaterial = m_fontMaterial;
760 
761  m_padding = GetPaddingForMaterial();
762 
763  m_ShouldRecalculateStencil = true;
764  SetVerticesDirty();
765  SetMaterialDirty();
766 
767  return m_sharedMaterial;
768  }

775  protected override Material[] GetMaterials(Material[] mats)
776  {
777  int materialCount = m_textInfo.materialCount;
778 
779  if (m_fontMaterials == null)
780  m_fontMaterials = new Material[materialCount];
781  else if (m_fontMaterials.Length != materialCount)
782  TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_fontMaterials, materialCount, false);
783 
784  // Get instances of the materials
785  for (int i = 0; i < materialCount; i++)
786  {
787  if (i == 0)
788  m_fontMaterials[i] = fontMaterial;
789  else
790  m_fontMaterials[i] = m_subTextObjects[i].material;
791  }
792 
793  m_fontSharedMaterials = m_fontMaterials;
794 
795  return m_fontMaterials;
796  }

819  protected override Material[] GetSharedMaterials()
820  {

824  m_fontSharedMaterials = new Material[materialCount];
825  else if (m_fontSharedMaterials.Length != materialCount)
826  TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_fontSharedMaterials, materialCount, false);

839 
843  protected override void SetSharedMaterials(Material[] materials)
844  {
845  int materialCount = m_textInfo.materialCount;
846 
847  // Check allocation of the fontSharedMaterials array.
848  if (m_fontSharedMaterials == null)
849  m_fontSharedMaterials = new Material[materialCount];
850  else if (m_fontSharedMaterials.Length != materialCount)
851  TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_fontSharedMaterials, materialCount, false);
852 
853  // Only assign as many materials as the text object contains.
854  for (int i = 0; i < materialCount; i++)
855  {
856  if (i == 0)
857  {
858  // Only assign new material if the font atlas textures match.
859  if (materials[i].GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex) == null || materials[i].GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID() != m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
860  continue;
861 
862  m_sharedMaterial = m_fontSharedMaterials[i] = materials[i];
863  m_padding = GetPaddingForMaterial(m_sharedMaterial);
864  }
865  else
866  {
867  // Only assign new material if the font atlas textures match.
868  if (materials[i].GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex) == null || materials[i].GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID() != m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
869  continue;
870 
871  // Only assign a new material if none were specified in the text input.
872  if (m_subTextObjects[i].isDefaultMaterial)
873  m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial = m_fontSharedMaterials[i] = materials[i];
874  }
875  }
876  }

879  // This function will create an instance of the Font Material.
880  protected override void SetOutlineThickness(float thickness)
881  {
882  // Use material instance if one exists. Otherwise, create a new instance of the shared material.
883  if (m_fontMaterial != null && m_sharedMaterial.GetInstanceID() != m_fontMaterial.GetInstanceID())
884  {
885  m_sharedMaterial = m_fontMaterial;
886  m_canvasRenderer.SetMaterial(m_sharedMaterial, m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex));
887  }
888  else if(m_fontMaterial == null)
889  {
890  m_fontMaterial = CreateMaterialInstance(m_sharedMaterial);
891  m_sharedMaterial = m_fontMaterial;
892  m_canvasRenderer.SetMaterial(m_sharedMaterial, m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex));
893  }
894 
895  thickness = Mathf.Clamp01(thickness);
896  m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_OutlineWidth, thickness);
897  m_padding = GetPaddingForMaterial();
898  }

933  return;

936  {

938  m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_ZTestMode, 0);
939  }

947  // Sets the Culling mode of the material
948  protected override void SetCulling()
949  {
950  if (m_isCullingEnabled)
951  {
952  Material mat = materialForRendering;
953 
954  if (mat != null)
955  mat.SetFloat("_CullMode", 2);
956 
957  for (int i = 1; i < m_subTextObjects.Length && m_subTextObjects[i] != null; i++)
958  {
959  mat = m_subTextObjects[i].materialForRendering;
960 
961  if (mat != null)
962  {
963  mat.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_CullMode, 2);
964  }
965  }
966  }
967  else
968  {
969  Material mat = materialForRendering;
970 
971  if (mat != null)
972  mat.SetFloat("_CullMode", 0);
973 
974  for (int i = 1; i < m_subTextObjects.Length && m_subTextObjects[i] != null; i++)
975  {
976  mat = m_subTextObjects[i].materialForRendering;
977 
978  if (mat != null)
979  {
980  mat.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_CullMode, 0);
981  }
982  }
983  }
984  }

1035  // This function parses through the Char[] to determine how many characters will be visible. It then makes sure the arrays are large enough for all those characters.
1036  protected override int SetArraySizes(UnicodeChar[] chars)
1037  {
1038  //Debug.Log("*** SetArraySizes() on Instance ID (" + GetInstanceID() + ") ***");
1039  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1040  Profiler.BeginSample("SetArraySizes");
1041  #endif
1042 
1043  int spriteCount = 0;
1044 
1045  m_totalCharacterCount = 0;
1046  m_isUsingBold = false;
1047  m_isParsingText = false;
1048  tag_NoParsing = false;
1049  m_FontStyleInternal = m_fontStyle;
1050 
1051  m_FontWeightInternal = (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold ? FontWeight.Bold : m_fontWeight;
1052  m_FontWeightStack.SetDefault(m_FontWeightInternal);
1053 
1054  m_currentFontAsset = m_fontAsset;
1055  m_currentMaterial = m_sharedMaterial;
1056  m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
1057 
1058  m_materialReferenceStack.SetDefault(new MaterialReference(m_currentMaterialIndex, m_currentFontAsset, null, m_currentMaterial, m_padding));
1059 
1060  m_materialReferenceIndexLookup.Clear();
1061  MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1062 
1063  if (m_textInfo == null) m_textInfo = new TMP_TextInfo();
1064  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1065 
1066  // Clear Linked Text object if we have one.
1067  if (m_linkedTextComponent != null)
1068  {
1069  m_linkedTextComponent.text = string.Empty;
1070  m_linkedTextComponent.ForceMeshUpdate();
1071  }
1072 
1073  // Parsing XML tags in the text
1074  for (int i = 0; i < chars.Length && chars[i].unicode != 0; i++)
1075  {
1076  //Make sure the characterInfo array can hold the next text element.
1077  if (m_textInfo.characterInfo == null || m_totalCharacterCount >= m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length)
1078  TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.characterInfo, m_totalCharacterCount + 1, true);
1079 
1080  int unicode = chars[i].unicode;
1081 
1082  // PARSE XML TAGS
1083  #region PARSE XML TAGS
1084  if (m_isRichText && unicode == 60) // if Char '<'
1085  {
1086  int prev_MaterialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1087 
1088  // Check if Tag is Valid
1089  if (ValidateHtmlTag(chars, i + 1, out int tagEnd))
1090  {
1091  int tagStartIndex = chars[i].stringIndex;
1092  i = tagEnd;
1093 
1094  if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold) m_isUsingBold = true;
1095 
1096  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
1097  {
1098  m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1099 
1100  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].character = (char)(57344 + m_spriteIndex);
1101  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteIndex = m_spriteIndex;
1102  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1103  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteAsset = m_currentSpriteAsset;
1104  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1105  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].textElement = m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable[m_spriteIndex];
1106  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].elementType = m_textElementType;
1107  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].index = tagStartIndex;
1108  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].stringLength = chars[i].stringIndex - tagStartIndex + 1;
1109 
1110  // Restore element type and material index to previous values.
1111  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1112  m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_MaterialIndex;
1113 
1114  spriteCount += 1;
1115  m_totalCharacterCount += 1;
1116  }
1117 
1118  continue;
1119  }
1120  }
1121  #endregion
1122 
1123  bool isUsingAlternativeTypeface = false;
1124  bool isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface = false;
1125 
1126  TMP_Character character;
1127  TMP_FontAsset tempFontAsset;
1128  TMP_FontAsset prev_fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1129  Material prev_material = m_currentMaterial;
1130  int prev_materialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1131 
1132 
1133  // Handle Font Styles like LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps.
1134  #region Handling of LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps Font Styles
1135  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
1136  {
1137  if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.UpperCase) == FontStyles.UpperCase)
1138  {
1139  // If this character is lowercase, switch to uppercase.
1140  if (char.IsLower((char)unicode))
1141  unicode = char.ToUpper((char)unicode);
1142 
1143  }
1144  else if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.LowerCase) == FontStyles.LowerCase)
1145  {
1146  // If this character is uppercase, switch to lowercase.
1147  if (char.IsUpper((char)unicode))
1148  unicode = char.ToLower((char)unicode);
1149  }
1150  else if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.SmallCaps) == FontStyles.SmallCaps)
1151  {
1152  // Only convert lowercase characters to uppercase.
1153  if (char.IsLower((char)unicode))
1154  unicode = char.ToUpper((char)unicode);
1155  }
1156  }
1157  #endregion
1158 
1159 
1160  // Lookup the Glyph data for each character and cache it.
1161  #region LOOKUP GLYPH
1162  character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset, false, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out tempFontAsset);
1163 
1164  // Search for the glyph in the list of fallback assigned to the primary font asset.
1165  if (character == null)
1166  {
1167  if (m_currentFontAsset.fallbackFontAssetTable != null && m_currentFontAsset.fallbackFontAssetTable.Count > 0)
1168  character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset.fallbackFontAssetTable, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out tempFontAsset);
1169  }
1170 
1171  // Search for the glyph in the Sprite Asset assigned to the text object.
1172  if (character == null)
1173  {
1174  TMP_SpriteAsset spriteAsset = this.spriteAsset;
1175 
1176  if (spriteAsset != null)
1177  {
1178  int spriteIndex = -1;
1179 
1180  // Check Default Sprite Asset and its Fallbacks
1181  spriteAsset = TMP_SpriteAsset.SearchForSpriteByUnicode(spriteAsset, (uint)unicode, true, out spriteIndex);
1182 
1183  if (spriteIndex != -1)
1184  {
1185  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
1186  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].elementType = m_textElementType;
1187 
1188  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(spriteAsset.material, spriteAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1189  m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1190 
1191  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].character = (char)unicode;
1192  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteIndex = spriteIndex;
1193  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1194  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteAsset = spriteAsset;
1195  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].textElement = spriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable[m_spriteIndex];
1196  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1197  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].index = chars[i].stringIndex;
1198  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].stringLength = chars[i].length;
1199 
1200  // Restore element type and material index to previous values.
1201  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1202  m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_materialIndex;
1203 
1204  spriteCount += 1;
1205  m_totalCharacterCount += 1;
1206 
1207  continue;
1208  }
1209  }
1210  }
1211 
1212  // Search for the glyph in the list of fallback assigned in the TMP Settings (General Fallbacks).
1213  if (character == null)
1214  {
1215  if (TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets != null && TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets.Count > 0)
1216  character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets((uint)unicode, TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out tempFontAsset);
1217  }
1218 
1219  // Search for the glyph in the Default Font Asset assigned in the TMP Settings file.
1220  if (character == null)
1221  {
1222  if (TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset != null)
1223  character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out tempFontAsset);
1224  }
1225 
1226  // TODO: Add support for using Sprite Assets like a special Emoji only Sprite Asset when UTF16 or UTF32 glyphs are requested.
1227  // This would kind of mirror native Emoji support.
1228  if (character == null)
1229  {
1230  TMP_SpriteAsset spriteAsset = TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAsset;
1231 
1232  if (spriteAsset != null)
1233  {
1234  int spriteIndex = -1;
1235 
1236  // Check Default Sprite Asset and its Fallbacks
1237  spriteAsset = TMP_SpriteAsset.SearchForSpriteByUnicode(spriteAsset, (uint)unicode, true, out spriteIndex);
1238 
1239  if (spriteIndex != -1)
1240  {
1241  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
1242  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].elementType = m_textElementType;
1243 
1244  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(spriteAsset.material, spriteAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1245  m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1246 
1247  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].character = (char)unicode;
1248  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteIndex = spriteIndex;
1249  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1250  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteAsset = spriteAsset;
1251  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].textElement = spriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable[m_spriteIndex];
1252  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1253  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].index = chars[i].stringIndex;
1254  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].stringLength = chars[i].length;
1255 
1256  // Restore element type and material index to previous values.
1257  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1258  m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_materialIndex;
1259 
1260  spriteCount += 1;
1261  m_totalCharacterCount += 1;
1262 
1263  continue;
1264  }
1265 
1266  }
1267  }
1268 
1269  //Check if Lowercase or Uppercase variant of the character is available.
1270  // Not sure this is necessary anyone as it is very unlikely with recursive search through fallback fonts.
1271  //if (glyph == null)
1272  //{
1273  // if (char.IsLower((char)c))
1274  // {
1275  // if (m_currentFontAsset.characterDictionary.TryGetValue(char.ToUpper((char)c), out glyph))
1276  // c = chars[i] = char.ToUpper((char)c);
1277  // }
1278  // else if (char.IsUpper((char)c))
1279  // {
1280  // if (m_currentFontAsset.characterDictionary.TryGetValue(char.ToLower((char)c), out glyph))
1281  // c = chars[i] = char.ToLower((char)c);
1282  // }
1283  //}
1284 
1285  // Replace missing glyph by the Square (9633) glyph or possibly the Space (32) glyph.
1286  if (character == null)
1287  {
1288  // Save the original unicode character
1289  int srcGlyph = unicode;
1290 
1291  // Try replacing the missing glyph character by TMP Settings Missing Glyph or Square (9633) character.
1292  unicode = chars[i].unicode = TMP_Settings.missingGlyphCharacter == 0 ? 9633 : TMP_Settings.missingGlyphCharacter;
1293 
1294  // Check for the missing glyph character in the currently assigned font asset and its fallbacks
1295  character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out tempFontAsset);
1296 
1297  if (character == null)
1298  {
1299  // Search for the missing glyph character in the TMP Settings Fallback list.
1300  if (TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets != null && TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets.Count > 0)
1301  character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets((uint)unicode, TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out tempFontAsset);
1302  }
1303 
1304  if (character == null)
1305  {
1306  // Search for the missing glyph in the TMP Settings Default Font Asset.
1307  if (TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset != null)
1308  character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out tempFontAsset);
1309  }
1310 
1311  if (character == null)
1312  {
1313  // Use Space (32) Glyph from the currently assigned font asset.
1314  unicode = chars[i].unicode = 32;
1315  character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out tempFontAsset);
1316  if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled) Debug.LogWarning("Character with ASCII value of " + srcGlyph + " was not found in the Font Asset Glyph Table. It was replaced by a space.", this);
1317  }
1318  }
1319 
1320  // Determine if the font asset is still the current font asset or a fallback.
1321  if (tempFontAsset != null)
1322  {
1323  if (tempFontAsset.GetInstanceID() != m_currentFontAsset.GetInstanceID())
1324  {
1325  isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface = true;
1326  m_currentFontAsset = tempFontAsset;
1327  }
1328  }
1329  #endregion
1330 
1331 
1332  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1333  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].textElement = character;
1334  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].isUsingAlternateTypeface = isUsingAlternativeTypeface;
1335  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].character = (char)unicode;
1336  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1337  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].index = chars[i].stringIndex;
1338  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].stringLength = chars[i].length;
1339 
1340  if (isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface)
1341  {
1342  // Create Fallback material instance matching current material preset if necessary
1343  if (TMP_Settings.matchMaterialPreset)
1344  m_currentMaterial = TMP_MaterialManager.GetFallbackMaterial(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset.material);
1345  else
1346  m_currentMaterial = m_currentFontAsset.material;
1347 
1348  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1349  }
1350 
1351  if (!char.IsWhiteSpace((char)unicode) && unicode != 0x200B)
1352  {
1353  // Limit the mesh of the main text object to 65535 vertices and use sub objects for the overflow.
1354  if (m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount < 16383)
1355  m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1356  else
1357  {
1358  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(new Material(m_currentMaterial), m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1359  m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1360  }
1361  }
1362 
1363  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].material = m_currentMaterial;
1364  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1365  m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].isFallbackMaterial = isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface;
1366 
1367  // Restore previous font asset and material if fallback font was used.
1368  if (isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface)
1369  {
1370  m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].fallbackMaterial = prev_material;
1371  m_currentFontAsset = prev_fontAsset;
1372  m_currentMaterial = prev_material;
1373  m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_materialIndex;
1374  }
1375 
1376  m_totalCharacterCount += 1;
1377  }
1378 
1379  // Early return if we are calculating the preferred values.
1380  if (m_isCalculatingPreferredValues)
1381  {
1382  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = false;
1383  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
1384  return m_totalCharacterCount;
1385  }
1386 
1387  // Save material and sprite count.
1388  m_textInfo.spriteCount = spriteCount;
1389  int materialCount = m_textInfo.materialCount = m_materialReferenceIndexLookup.Count;
1390 
1391  // Check if we need to resize the MeshInfo array for handling different materials.
1392  if (materialCount > m_textInfo.meshInfo.Length)
1393  TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.meshInfo, materialCount, false);
1394 
1395  // Resize SubTextObject array if necessary
1396  if (materialCount > m_subTextObjects.Length)
1397  TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_subTextObjects, Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(materialCount + 1));
1398 
1399  // Resize CharacterInfo[] if allocations are excessive
1400  if (m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length - m_totalCharacterCount > 256)
1401  TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.characterInfo, Mathf.Max(m_totalCharacterCount + 1, 256), true);
1402 
1403 
1404  // Iterate through the material references to set the mesh buffer allocations
1405  for (int i = 0; i < materialCount; i++)
1406  {
1407  // Add new sub text object for each material reference
1408  if (i > 0)
1409  {
1410  if (m_subTextObjects[i] == null)
1411  {
1412  m_subTextObjects[i] = TMP_SubMeshUI.AddSubTextObject(this, m_materialReferences[i]);
1413 
1414  // Not sure this is necessary
1415  m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices = null;
1416  }
1417  //else if (m_subTextObjects[i].gameObject.activeInHierarchy == false)
1418  // m_subTextObjects[i].gameObject.SetActive(true);
1419 
1420  // Make sure the pivots are synchronized
1421  if (m_rectTransform.pivot != m_subTextObjects[i].rectTransform.pivot)
1422  m_subTextObjects[i].rectTransform.pivot = m_rectTransform.pivot;
1423 
1424  // Check if the material has changed.
1425  if (m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial == null || m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial.GetInstanceID() != m_materialReferences[i].material.GetInstanceID())
1426  {
1427  bool isDefaultMaterial = m_materialReferences[i].isDefaultMaterial;
1428 
1429  m_subTextObjects[i].isDefaultMaterial = isDefaultMaterial;
1430 
1431  // Assign new material if we are not using the default material or if the font asset has changed.
1432  if (!isDefaultMaterial || m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial == null || m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID() != m_materialReferences[i].material.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
1433  {
1434  m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial = m_materialReferences[i].material;
1435  m_subTextObjects[i].fontAsset = m_materialReferences[i].fontAsset;
1436  m_subTextObjects[i].spriteAsset = m_materialReferences[i].spriteAsset;
1437  }
1438  }
1439 
1440  // Check if we need to use a Fallback Material
1441  if (m_materialReferences[i].isFallbackMaterial)
1442  {
1443  m_subTextObjects[i].fallbackMaterial = m_materialReferences[i].material;
1444  m_subTextObjects[i].fallbackSourceMaterial = m_materialReferences[i].fallbackMaterial;
1445  }
1446 
1447  }
1448 
1449  int referenceCount = m_materialReferences[i].referenceCount;
1450 
1451  // Check to make sure our buffers allocations can accommodate the required text elements.
1452  if (m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices == null || m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices.Length < referenceCount * 4)
1453  {
1454  if (m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices == null)
1455  {
1456  if (i == 0)
1457  m_textInfo.meshInfo[i] = new TMP_MeshInfo(m_mesh, referenceCount + 1);
1458  else
1459  m_textInfo.meshInfo[i] = new TMP_MeshInfo(m_subTextObjects[i].mesh, referenceCount + 1);
1460  }
1461  else
1462  m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].ResizeMeshInfo(referenceCount > 1024 ? referenceCount + 256 : Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(referenceCount + 1));
1463  }
1464  else if (m_VertexBufferAutoSizeReduction && referenceCount > 0 && m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices.Length / 4 - referenceCount > 256)
1465  {
1466  // Resize vertex buffers if allocations are excessive.
1467  //Debug.Log("Reducing the size of the vertex buffers.");
1468  m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].ResizeMeshInfo(referenceCount > 1024 ? referenceCount + 256 : Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(referenceCount + 1));
1469  }
1470  }
1471 
1472  //TMP_MaterialManager.CleanupFallbackMaterials();
1473 
1474  // Clean up unused SubMeshes
1475  for (int i = materialCount; i < m_subTextObjects.Length && m_subTextObjects[i] != null; i++)
1476  {
1477  if (i < m_textInfo.meshInfo.Length)
1478  {
1479  m_subTextObjects[i].canvasRenderer.SetMesh(null);
1480 
1481  // TODO: Figure out a way to handle this without running into Unity's Rebuild loop issue.
1482  //m_subTextObjects[i].gameObject.SetActive(false);
1483  }
1484  }
1485 
1486  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1487  Profiler.EndSample();
1488  #endif
1489 
1490  return m_totalCharacterCount;
1491  }

1581

1666  {
1667  //Debug.Log("*** GenerateTextMesh() ***"); // ***** Frame: " + Time.frameCount); // + ". Point Size: " + m_fontSize + ". Margins are (W) " + m_marginWidth + " (H) " + m_marginHeight); // ". Iteration Count: " + loopCountA + ". Min: " + m_minFontSize + " Max: " + m_maxFontSize + " Delta: " + (m_maxFontSize - m_minFontSize) + " Font size is " + m_fontSize); //called for Object with ID " + GetInstanceID()); // Assigned Material is " + m_uiRenderer.GetMaterial().name); // IncludeForMasking " + this.m_IncludeForMasking); // and text is " + m_text);

1696  m_currentFontAsset = m_fontAsset;

1843  SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLineState, -1, -1);
1844 
1845  loopCountA += 1;
1846  //Profiler.EndSample();
1847 
1848  #if TMP_PROFILE_PHASES_ON
1849  Profiler.BeginSample("TMP Generate Text - Phase I");
1850  #endif
1851 
1852  // Parse through Character buffer to read HTML tags and begin creating mesh.
1853  for (int i = 0; i < m_TextParsingBuffer.Length && m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode != 0; i++)
1854  {
1855  charCode = m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode;
1856 
1857  // Parse Rich Text Tag
1858  #region Parse Rich Text Tag
1859  if (m_isRichText && charCode == 60) // '<'
1860  {
1861  m_isParsingText = true;
1862  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1863 
1864  // Check if Tag is valid. If valid, skip to the end of the validated tag.
1865  if (ValidateHtmlTag(m_TextParsingBuffer, i + 1, out int tagEndIndex))
1866  {
1867  i = tagEndIndex;
1868 
1869  // Continue to next character or handle the sprite element
1870  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
1871  continue;
1872  }
1873  }
1874  else
1875  {
1876  m_textElementType = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType;
1877  m_currentMaterialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex;
1878  m_currentFontAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset;
1879  }
1880  #endregion End Parse Rich Text Tag
1881 
1882  int prev_MaterialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1883  bool isUsingAltTypeface = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isUsingAlternateTypeface;
1884 
1885  m_isParsingText = false;
1886 
1887  // When using Linked text, mark character as ignored and skip to next character.
1888  if (m_characterCount < m_firstVisibleCharacter)
1889  {
1890  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
1891  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].character = (char)0x200B;
1892  m_characterCount += 1;
1893  continue;
1894  }
1895 
1896  // Handle Font Styles like LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps.
1897  #region Handling of LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps Font Styles
1898  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1899  Profiler.BeginSample("Handle Font Style");
1900  #endif
1901  float smallCapsMultiplier = 1.0f;
1902 
1903  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
1904  {
1905  if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.UpperCase) == FontStyles.UpperCase)
1906  {
1907  // If this character is lowercase, switch to uppercase.
1908  if (char.IsLower((char)charCode))
1909  charCode = char.ToUpper((char)charCode);
1910 
1911  }
1912  else if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.LowerCase) == FontStyles.LowerCase)
1913  {
1914  // If this character is uppercase, switch to lowercase.
1915  if (char.IsUpper((char)charCode))
1916  charCode = char.ToLower((char)charCode);
1917  }
1918  else if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.SmallCaps) == FontStyles.SmallCaps)
1919  {
1920  if (char.IsLower((char)charCode))
1921  {
1922  smallCapsMultiplier = 0.8f;
1923  charCode = char.ToUpper((char)charCode);
1924  }
1925  }
1926  }
1927  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1928  Profiler.EndSample();
1929  #endif
1930  #endregion
1931 
1932 
1933  // Look up Character Data from Dictionary and cache it.
1934  #region Look up Character Data
1935  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1936  Profiler.BeginSample("Lookup Character Data");
1937  #endif
1938  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
1939  {
1940  // If a sprite is used as a fallback then get a reference to it and set the color to white.
1941  m_currentSpriteAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteAsset;
1942  m_spriteIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteIndex;
1943 
1944  TMP_SpriteCharacter sprite = m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable[m_spriteIndex];
1945  if (sprite == null) continue;
1946 
1947  // Sprites are assigned in the E000 Private Area + sprite Index
1948  if (charCode == 60)
1949  charCode = 57344 + m_spriteIndex;
1950  else
1951  m_spriteColor = s_colorWhite;
1952 
1953  // The sprite scale calculations are based on the font asset assigned to the text object.
1954  float spriteScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale);
1955  currentElementScale = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine / sprite.glyph.metrics.height * sprite.scale * sprite.glyph.scale * spriteScale;
1956 
1957  m_cached_TextElement = sprite;
1958 
1959  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
1960  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].scale = spriteScale;
1961  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteAsset = m_currentSpriteAsset;
1962  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1963  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1964 
1965  m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_MaterialIndex;
1966 
1967  padding = 0;
1968  }
1969  else if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
1970  {
1971  m_cached_TextElement = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].textElement;
1972  if (m_cached_TextElement == null) continue;
1973 
1974  m_currentFontAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset;
1975  m_currentMaterial = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].material;
1976  m_currentMaterialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex;
1977 
1978  // Re-calculate font scale as the font asset may have changed.
1979  m_fontScale = m_currentFontSize * smallCapsMultiplier / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale;
1980 
1981  currentElementScale = m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_cached_TextElement.scale * m_cached_TextElement.glyph.scale;
1982 
1983  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1984  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].scale = currentElementScale;
1985 
1986  padding = m_currentMaterialIndex == 0 ? m_padding : m_subTextObjects[m_currentMaterialIndex].padding;
1987  }
1988  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1989  Profiler.EndSample();
1990  #endif
1991  #endregion
1992 
1993 
1994  // Handle Soft Hyphen
1995  #region Handle Soft Hyphen
1996  float old_scale = currentElementScale;
1997  if (charCode == 0xAD)
1998  {
1999  currentElementScale = 0;
2000  }
2001  #endregion
2002 
2003 
2004  // Store some of the text object's information
2005  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].character = (char)charCode;
2006  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].pointSize = m_currentFontSize;
2007  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].color = m_htmlColor;
2008  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].underlineColor = m_underlineColor;
2009  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].strikethroughColor = m_strikethroughColor;
2010  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].highlightColor = m_highlightColor;
2011  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].style = m_FontStyleInternal;
2012  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].index = m_TextParsingBuffer[i].stringIndex;
2013  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isIgnoringAlignment = m_isIgnoringAlignment;
2014 
2015 
2016  // Handle Kerning if Enabled.
2017  #region Handle Kerning
2018  TMP_GlyphValueRecord glyphAdjustments = new TMP_GlyphValueRecord();
2019  float characterSpacingAdjustment = m_characterSpacing;
2020  if (m_enableKerning)
2021  {
2022  if (m_characterCount < totalCharacterCount - 1)
2023  {
2024  uint firstGlyphIndex = m_cached_TextElement.glyphIndex;
2025  uint secondGlyphIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount + 1].textElement.glyphIndex;
2026  long key = new GlyphPairKey(firstGlyphIndex, secondGlyphIndex).key;
2027 
2028  if (m_currentFontAsset.fontFeatureTable.m_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecordLookupDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out TMP_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecord adjustmentPair))
2029  {
2030  glyphAdjustments = adjustmentPair.firstAdjustmentRecord.glyphValueRecord;
2031  characterSpacingAdjustment = (adjustmentPair.featureLookupFlags & FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments) == FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments ? 0 : characterSpacingAdjustment;
2032  }
2033  }
2034 
2035  if (m_characterCount >= 1)
2036  {
2037  uint firstGlyphIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].textElement.glyphIndex;
2038  uint secondGlyphIndex = m_cached_TextElement.glyphIndex;
2039  long key = new GlyphPairKey(firstGlyphIndex, secondGlyphIndex).key;
2040 
2041  if (m_currentFontAsset.fontFeatureTable.m_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecordLookupDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out TMP_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecord adjustmentPair))
2042  {
2043  glyphAdjustments += adjustmentPair.secondAdjustmentRecord.glyphValueRecord;
2044  characterSpacingAdjustment = (adjustmentPair.featureLookupFlags & FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments) == FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments ? 0 : characterSpacingAdjustment;
2045  }
2046  }
2047  }
2048  #endregion
2049 
2050 
2051  // Initial Implementation for RTL support.
2052  #region Handle Right-to-Left
2053  if (m_isRightToLeft)
2054  {
2055  m_xAdvance -= ((m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalAdvance * bold_xAdvance_multiplier + characterSpacingAdjustment + m_wordSpacing + m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset) * currentElementScale + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
2056 
2057  if (char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) || charCode == 0x200B)
2058  m_xAdvance -= m_wordSpacing * currentElementScale;
2059  }
2060  #endregion
2061 
2062 
2063  // Handle Mono Spacing
2064  #region Handle Mono Spacing
2065  float monoAdvance = 0;
2066  if (m_monoSpacing != 0)
2067  {
2068  monoAdvance = (m_monoSpacing / 2 - (m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.width / 2 + m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalBearingX) * currentElementScale) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
2069  m_xAdvance += monoAdvance;
2070  }
2071  #endregion
2072 
2073 
2074  // Set Padding based on selected font style
2075  #region Handle Style Padding
2076  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character && !isUsingAltTypeface && ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold)) // Checks for any combination of Bold Style.
2077  {
2078  if (m_currentMaterial.HasProperty(ShaderUtilities.ID_GradientScale))
2079  {
2080  float gradientScale = m_currentMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_GradientScale);
2081  style_padding = m_currentFontAsset.boldStyle / 4.0f * gradientScale * m_currentMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_ScaleRatio_A);
2082 
2083  // Clamp overall padding to Gradient Scale size.
2084  if (style_padding + padding > gradientScale)
2085  padding = gradientScale - style_padding;
2086  }
2087  else
2088  style_padding = 0;
2089 
2090  bold_xAdvance_multiplier = 1 + m_currentFontAsset.boldSpacing * 0.01f;
2091  }
2092  else
2093  {
2094  if (m_currentMaterial.HasProperty(ShaderUtilities.ID_GradientScale))
2095  {
2096  float gradientScale = m_currentMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_GradientScale);
2097  style_padding = m_currentFontAsset.normalStyle / 4.0f * gradientScale * m_currentMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_ScaleRatio_A);
2098 
2099  // Clamp overall padding to Gradient Scale size.
2100  if (style_padding + padding > gradientScale)
2101  padding = gradientScale - style_padding;
2102  }
2103  else
2104  style_padding = 0;
2105 
2106  bold_xAdvance_multiplier = 1.0f;
2107  }
2108  #endregion Handle Style Padding
2109 
2110 
2111  // Determine the position of the vertices of the Character or Sprite.
2112  #region Calculate Vertices Position
2113  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2114  Profiler.BeginSample("Calculate Vertices Position");
2115  #endif
2116  float fontBaseLineOffset = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.baseline * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale;
2117  Vector3 top_left;
2118  top_left.x = m_xAdvance + ((m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalBearingX - padding - style_padding + glyphAdjustments.xPlacement) * currentElementScale * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta));
2119  top_left.y = fontBaseLineOffset + (m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalBearingY + padding + glyphAdjustments.yPlacement) * currentElementScale - m_lineOffset + m_baselineOffset;
2120  top_left.z = 0;
2121 
2122  Vector3 bottom_left;
2123  bottom_left.x = top_left.x;
2124  bottom_left.y = top_left.y - ((m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.height + padding * 2) * currentElementScale);
2125  bottom_left.z = 0;
2126 
2127  Vector3 top_right;
2128  top_right.x = bottom_left.x + ((m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.width + padding * 2 + style_padding * 2) * currentElementScale * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta));
2129  top_right.y = top_left.y;
2130  top_right.z = 0;
2131 
2132  Vector3 bottom_right;
2133  bottom_right.x = top_right.x;
2134  bottom_right.y = bottom_left.y;
2135  bottom_right.z = 0;
2136 
2137  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2138  Profiler.EndSample();
2139  #endif
2140  #endregion
2141 
2142 
2143  // Check if we need to Shear the rectangles for Italic styles
2144  #region Handle Italic & Shearing
2145  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character && !isUsingAltTypeface && ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Italic) == FontStyles.Italic))
2146  {
2147  // Shift Top vertices forward by half (Shear Value * height of character) and Bottom vertices back by same amount.
2148  float shear_value = m_currentFontAsset.italicStyle * 0.01f;
2149  Vector3 topShear = new Vector3(shear_value * ((m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalBearingY + padding + style_padding) * currentElementScale), 0, 0);
2150  Vector3 bottomShear = new Vector3(shear_value * (((m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalBearingY - m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.height - padding - style_padding)) * currentElementScale), 0, 0);
2151 
2152  top_left = top_left + topShear;
2153  bottom_left = bottom_left + bottomShear;
2154  top_right = top_right + topShear;
2155  bottom_right = bottom_right + bottomShear;
2156  }
2157  #endregion Handle Italics & Shearing
2158 
2159 
2160  // Handle Character Rotation
2161  #region Handle Character Rotation
2162  if (m_isFXMatrixSet)
2163  {
2164  // Apply scale matrix when simulating Condensed text.
2165  if (m_FXMatrix.lossyScale.x != 1)
2166  {
2167  //top_left = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(top_left);
2168  //bottom_left = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(bottom_left);
2169  //top_right = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(top_right);
2170  //bottom_right = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(bottom_right);
2171  }
2172 
2173  Vector3 positionOffset = (top_right + bottom_left) / 2;
2174 
2175  top_left = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(top_left - positionOffset) + positionOffset;
2176  bottom_left = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(bottom_left - positionOffset) + positionOffset;
2177  top_right = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(top_right - positionOffset) + positionOffset;
2178  bottom_right = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(bottom_right - positionOffset) + positionOffset;
2179  }
2180  #endregion
2181 
2182 
2183  // Store vertex information for the character or sprite.
2184  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft = bottom_left;
2185  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topLeft = top_left;
2186  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight = top_right;
2187  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomRight = bottom_right;
2188 
2189  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].origin = m_xAdvance;
2190  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].baseLine = fontBaseLineOffset - m_lineOffset + m_baselineOffset;
2191  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].aspectRatio = (top_right.x - bottom_left.x) / (top_left.y - bottom_left.y);
2192 
2193 
2194  // Compute and save text element Ascender and maximum line Ascender.
2195  float elementAscender = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine * (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character ? currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier : m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].scale) + m_baselineOffset;
2196  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].ascender = elementAscender - m_lineOffset;
2197  m_maxLineAscender = elementAscender > m_maxLineAscender ? elementAscender : m_maxLineAscender;
2198 
2199  // Compute and save text element Descender and maximum line Descender.
2200  float elementDescender = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.descentLine * (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character ? currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier : m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].scale) + m_baselineOffset;
2201  float elementDescenderII = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].descender = elementDescender - m_lineOffset;
2202  m_maxLineDescender = elementDescender < m_maxLineDescender ? elementDescender : m_maxLineDescender;
2203 
2204  // Adjust maxLineAscender and maxLineDescender if style is superscript or subscript
2205  if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Subscript) == FontStyles.Subscript || (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Superscript) == FontStyles.Superscript)
2206  {
2207  float baseAscender = (elementAscender - m_baselineOffset) / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize;
2208  elementAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
2209  m_maxLineAscender = baseAscender > m_maxLineAscender ? baseAscender : m_maxLineAscender;
2210 
2211  float baseDescender = (elementDescender - m_baselineOffset) / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize;
2212  elementDescender = m_maxLineDescender;
2213  m_maxLineDescender = baseDescender < m_maxLineDescender ? baseDescender : m_maxLineDescender;
2214  }
2215 
2216  if (m_lineNumber == 0 || m_isNewPage)
2217  {
2218  m_maxAscender = m_maxAscender > elementAscender ? m_maxAscender : elementAscender;
2219  m_maxCapHeight = Mathf.Max(m_maxCapHeight, m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.capLine * currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier);
2220  }
2221  if (m_lineOffset == 0) pageAscender = pageAscender > elementAscender ? pageAscender : elementAscender;
2222 
2223 
2224  // Set Characters to not visible by default.
2225  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
2226 
2227  // Setup Mesh for visible text elements. ie. not a SPACE / LINEFEED / CARRIAGE RETURN.
2228  #region Handle Visible Characters
2229  //#if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2230  //Profiler.BeginSample("Handle Visible Characters");
2231  //#endif
2232  if (charCode == 9 || charCode == 0xA0 || charCode == 0x2007 || (!char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) && charCode != 0x200B) || m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
2233  {
2234  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = true;
2235 
2236  #region Experimental Margin Shaper
2237  //Vector2 shapedMargins;
2238  //if (marginShaper)
2239  //{
2240  // shapedMargins = m_marginShaper.GetShapedMargins(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].baseLine);
2241  // if (shapedMargins.x < margins.x)

2272  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginLeft = m_marginLeft;
2273 
2274  bool isJustifiedOrFlush = ((_HorizontalAlignmentOptions)m_lineJustification & _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush) == _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush || ((_HorizontalAlignmentOptions)m_lineJustification & _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified) == _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified;
2275 
2276  // Calculate the line breaking width of the text.
2277  linebreakingWidth = Mathf.Abs(m_xAdvance) + (!m_isRightToLeft ? m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalAdvance : 0) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta) * (charCode != 0xAD ? currentElementScale : old_scale);
2278 
2279  // Check if Character exceeds the width of the Text Container
2280  #region Handle Line Breaking, Text Auto-Sizing and Horizontal Overflow
2281  if (linebreakingWidth > width * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f))
2282  {
2283  ellipsisIndex = m_characterCount - 1; // Last safely rendered character
2284 
2285  // Word Wrapping
2286  #region Handle Word Wrapping
2287  if (enableWordWrapping && m_characterCount != m_firstCharacterOfLine)
2288  {
2289  // Check if word wrapping is still possible
2290  #region Line Breaking Check
2291  if (wrappingIndex == m_SavedWordWrapState.previous_WordBreak || isFirstWord)
2292  {
2293  // Word wrapping is no longer possible. Shrink size of text if auto-sizing is enabled.
2294  if (m_enableAutoSizing && m_fontSize > m_fontSizeMin)
2295  {
2296  // Handle Character Width Adjustments
2297  #region Character Width Adjustments
2298  if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100)
2299  {
2300  loopCountA = 0;
2301  m_charWidthAdjDelta += 0.01f;
2302  GenerateTextMesh();
2303  return;
2304  }
2305  #endregion
2306 
2307  // Adjust Point Size
2308  m_maxFontSize = m_fontSize;
2309 
2310  m_fontSize -= Mathf.Max((m_fontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
2311  m_fontSize = (int)(Mathf.Max(m_fontSize, m_fontSizeMin) * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f;
2312 
2313  if (loopCountA > 20) return; // Added to debug
2314  GenerateTextMesh();
2315  return;
2316  }
2317 
2318  // Word wrapping is no longer possible, now breaking up individual words.
2319  if (m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled == false)
2320  {
2321  if (ignoreNonBreakingSpace == false)
2322  ignoreNonBreakingSpace = true;
2323  else
2324  m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled = true;
2325  }
2326  else
2327  isLastBreakingChar = true;
2328 
2329  //m_recursiveCount += 1;
2330  //if (m_recursiveCount > 20)
2331  //{
2332  // Debug.Log("Recursive count exceeded!");
2333  // continue;
2334  //}
2335  }
2336  #endregion
2337 
2338  // Restore to previously stored state of last valid (space character or linefeed)
2339  i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState);
2340  wrappingIndex = i; // Used to detect when line length can no longer be reduced.
2341 
2342  // Handling for Soft Hyphen
2343  if (m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode == 0xAD) // && !m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled) // && ellipsisIndex != i && !m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled)
2344  {

2346  m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode = 0x2D;
2347  GenerateTextMesh();

2349  }
2350 
2351  //Debug.Log("Last Visible Character of line # " + m_lineNumber + " is [" + m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].character + " Character Count: " + m_characterCount + " Last visible: " + m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine);
2352 
2353  // Check if Line Spacing of previous line needs to be adjusted.
2354  if (m_lineNumber > 0 && !TMP_Math.Approximately(m_maxLineAscender, m_startOfLineAscender) && m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET && !m_isNewPage)
2355  {
2356  //Debug.Log("(Line Break - Adjusting Line Spacing on line #" + m_lineNumber);
2357  float offsetDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
2358  AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, offsetDelta);
2359  m_lineOffset += offsetDelta;
2360  m_SavedWordWrapState.lineOffset = m_lineOffset;
2361  m_SavedWordWrapState.previousLineAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
2362 
2363  // TODO - Add check for character exceeding vertical bounds
2364  }
2365  m_isNewPage = false;
2366 
2367  // Calculate lineAscender & make sure if last character is superscript or subscript that we check that as well.
2368  float lineAscender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
2369  float lineDescender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
2370 
2371 
2372  // Update maxDescender and maxVisibleDescender
2373  m_maxDescender = m_maxDescender < lineDescender ? m_maxDescender : lineDescender;
2374  if (!isMaxVisibleDescenderSet)
2375  maxVisibleDescender = m_maxDescender;
2376 
2377  if (m_useMaxVisibleDescender && (m_characterCount >= m_maxVisibleCharacters || m_lineNumber >= m_maxVisibleLines))
2378  isMaxVisibleDescenderSet = true;
2379 
2380  // Track & Store lineInfo for the new line
2381  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstCharacterIndex = m_firstCharacterOfLine;
2382  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstVisibleCharacterIndex = m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_firstCharacterOfLine > m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine ? m_firstCharacterOfLine : m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine;
2383  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastCharacterIndex = m_lastCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount - 1 > 0 ? m_characterCount - 1 : 0;
2384  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastVisibleCharacterIndex = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine < m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine ? m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine : m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine;
2385 
2386  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].characterCount = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastCharacterIndex - m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstCharacterIndex + 1;
2387  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].visibleCharacterCount = m_lineVisibleCharacterCount;
2388  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.min = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine].bottomLeft.x, lineDescender);
2389  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.max = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].topRight.x, lineAscender);
2390  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].length = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.max.x;

2392 
2393  //m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].alignment = m_lineJustification;
2394 
2395  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].maxAdvance = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].xAdvance - (characterSpacingAdjustment + m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset) * currentElementScale - m_cSpacing;
2396 
2397  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].baseline = 0 - m_lineOffset;
2398  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].ascender = lineAscender;
2399  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].descender = lineDescender;
2400  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineHeight = lineAscender - lineDescender + lineGap * baseScale;
2401 
2402  m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount; // Store first character of the next line.
2403  m_lineVisibleCharacterCount = 0;
2404 
2405  // Store the state of the line before starting on the new line.
2406  SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLineState, i, m_characterCount - 1);
2407 
2408  m_lineNumber += 1;
2409  isStartOfNewLine = true;
2410  isFirstWord = true;
2411 
2412  // Check to make sure Array is large enough to hold a new line.
2413  if (m_lineNumber >= m_textInfo.lineInfo.Length)
2414  ResizeLineExtents(m_lineNumber);
2415 
2416  // Apply Line Spacing based on scale of the last character of the line.
2417  if (m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
2418  {
2419  float ascender = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].ascender - m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].baseLine;
2420  lineOffsetDelta = 0 - m_maxLineDescender + ascender + (lineGap + m_lineSpacing + m_lineSpacingDelta) * baseScale;
2421  m_lineOffset += lineOffsetDelta;
2422 
2423  m_startOfLineAscender = ascender;
2424  }
2425  else
2426  m_lineOffset += m_lineHeight + m_lineSpacing * baseScale;
2427 
2428  m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
2429  m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
2430 
2431  m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
2432 
2433  continue;
2434  }
2435  #endregion End Word Wrapping
2436 
2437 
2438  // Text Auto-Sizing (text exceeding Width of container.
2439  #region Handle Text Auto-Sizing
2440  if (m_enableAutoSizing && m_fontSize > m_fontSizeMin)
2441  {
2442  // Handle Character Width Adjustments
2443  #region Character Width Adjustments
2444  if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100)
2445  {
2446  loopCountA = 0;
2447  m_charWidthAdjDelta += 0.01f;
2448  GenerateTextMesh();
2449  return;
2450  }
2451  #endregion
2452 
2453  // Adjust Point Size
2454  m_maxFontSize = m_fontSize;
2455 
2456  m_fontSize -= Mathf.Max((m_fontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
2457  m_fontSize = (int)(Mathf.Max(m_fontSize, m_fontSizeMin) * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f;
2458 
2459  //m_recursiveCount = 0;
2460  if (loopCountA > 20) return; // Added to debug
2461  GenerateTextMesh();
2462  return;
2463  }
2464  #endregion End Text Auto-Sizing
2465 
2466 
2467  // Handle Text Overflow
2468  #region Handle Text Overflow
2469  switch (m_overflowMode)
2470  {
2471  case TextOverflowModes.Overflow:
2472  if (m_isMaskingEnabled)
2473  DisableMasking();
2474 
2475  break;
2476  case TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis:
2477  if (m_isMaskingEnabled)
2478  DisableMasking();

2481 
2482  if (m_characterCount < 1)
2483  {
2484  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
2485  //m_visibleCharacterCount = 0;
2486  break;
2487  }
2488 
2489  m_TextParsingBuffer[i - 1].unicode = 8230;
2490  m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode = (char)0;
2491 
2492  if (m_cached_Ellipsis_Character != null)
2493  {
2494  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].character = (char)8230;
2495  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].textElement = m_cached_Ellipsis_Character;
2496  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].fontAsset = m_materialReferences[0].fontAsset;
2497  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].material = m_materialReferences[0].material;
2498  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].materialReferenceIndex = 0;
2499  }
2500  else
2501  {
2502  Debug.LogWarning("Unable to use Ellipsis character since it wasn't found in the current Font Asset [" + m_fontAsset.name + "]. Consider regenerating this font asset to include the Ellipsis character (u+2026).\nNote: Warnings can be disabled in the TMP Settings file.", this);
2503  }

2506

2509  //case TextOverflowModes.Masking:
2510  // if (!m_isMaskingEnabled)
2511  // EnableMasking();
2512  // break;
2513  //case TextOverflowModes.ScrollRect:
2514  // if (!m_isMaskingEnabled)
2515  // EnableMasking();
2516  // break;
2517  case TextOverflowModes.Truncate:
2518  if (m_isMaskingEnabled)
2519  DisableMasking();
2520 
2521  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
2522  break;
2523  case TextOverflowModes.Linked:
2524  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
2525 
2526  //if (m_linkedTextComponent != null)
2527  //{
2528  // m_linkedTextComponent.text = text;
2529  // m_linkedTextComponent.firstVisibleCharacter = m_characterCount;
2530  // m_linkedTextComponent.ForceMeshUpdate();
2531  //}
2532  break;

2535 
2536  }

2538 
2539 
2540  // Special handling of characters that are not ignored at the end of a line.
2541  if (charCode == 9 || charCode == 0xA0 || charCode == 0x2007)

2543  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
2544  m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
2545  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].spaceCount += 1;
2546  m_textInfo.spaceCount += 1;
2547

2550  }
2551  else

2554  if (m_overrideHtmlColors)

2556  else
2557  vertexColor = m_htmlColor;
2558

2560  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
2561  {

2564  }

2568  }
2569  }

2573  if (m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible && charCode != 0xAD)

2576

2578  m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
2579  }
2580  }
2581  else

2583 
2584  // Track # of spaces per line which is used for line justification.

2586  {
2587  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].spaceCount += 1;
2588  m_textInfo.spaceCount += 1;
2589  }

2592  //Profiler.EndSample();

2597  // Check if Line Spacing of previous line needs to be adjusted.
2598  #region Adjust Line Spacing
2599  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2600  Profiler.BeginSample("Adjust Line Spacing");
2601  #endif
2602  if (m_lineNumber > 0 && !TMP_Math.Approximately(m_maxLineAscender, m_startOfLineAscender) && m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET && !m_isNewPage)
2603  {
2604  //Debug.Log("Inline - Adjusting Line Spacing on line #" + m_lineNumber);
2605  //float gap = 0; // Compute gap.
2606 
2607  float offsetDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
2608  AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, offsetDelta);
2609  elementDescenderII -= offsetDelta;
2610  m_lineOffset += offsetDelta;
2611

2613  m_SavedWordWrapState.lineOffset = m_lineOffset;
2614  m_SavedWordWrapState.previousLineAscender = m_startOfLineAscender;

2635  Profiler.BeginSample("Check Vertical Bounds");
2636  #endif
2637  if (m_maxAscender - elementDescenderII > marginHeight + 0.0001f)
2638  {
2639  // Handle Line spacing adjustments
2640  #region Line Spacing Adjustments
2641  if (m_enableAutoSizing && m_lineSpacingDelta > m_lineSpacingMax && m_lineNumber > 0)
2642  {
2643  loopCountA = 0;
2644

2646  GenerateTextMesh();
2647  return;
2648  }
2649  #endregion
2650

2654  if (m_enableAutoSizing && m_fontSize > m_fontSizeMin)
2655  {
2656  m_maxFontSize = m_fontSize;
2657

2660 
2661  //m_recursiveCount = 0;

2664  return;
2665  }
2666  #endregion Text Auto-Sizing
2667 
2668  // Set isTextOverflowing and firstOverflowCharacterIndex
2669  if (m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex == -1)
2670  m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex = m_characterCount;
2671 
2672  // Handle Text Overflow
2673  #region Text Overflow
2674  switch (m_overflowMode)
2675  {
2676  case TextOverflowModes.Overflow:
2677  if (m_isMaskingEnabled)
2678  DisableMasking();
2679 
2680  break;
2681  case TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis:
2682  if (m_isMaskingEnabled)
2683  DisableMasking();
2684 
2685  if (m_lineNumber > 0)
2686  {
2687  m_TextParsingBuffer[m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].index].unicode = 8230;
2688  m_TextParsingBuffer[m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].index + 1].unicode = (char)0;
2689 
2690  if (m_cached_Ellipsis_Character != null)
2691  {
2692  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].character = (char)8230;
2693  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].textElement = m_cached_Ellipsis_Character;
2694  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].fontAsset = m_materialReferences[0].fontAsset;
2695  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].material = m_materialReferences[0].material;
2696  m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].materialReferenceIndex = 0;
2697  }
2698  else
2699  {
2700  Debug.LogWarning("Unable to use Ellipsis character since it wasn't found in the current Font Asset [" + m_fontAsset.name + "]. Consider regenerating this font asset to include the Ellipsis character (u+2026).\nNote: Warnings can be disabled in the TMP Settings file.", this);
2701  }
2702 
2703  m_totalCharacterCount = ellipsisIndex + 1;
2704 
2705  GenerateTextMesh();
2706  m_isTextTruncated = true;
2707  return;
2708  }
2709  else
2710  {
2711  ClearMesh();
2712  return;
2713  }
2714  //case TextOverflowModes.Masking:
2715  // if (!m_isMaskingEnabled)
2716  // EnableMasking();
2717  // break;
2718  //case TextOverflowModes.ScrollRect:
2719  // if (!m_isMaskingEnabled)
2720  // EnableMasking();
2721  // break;
2722  case TextOverflowModes.Truncate:
2723  if (m_isMaskingEnabled)
2724  DisableMasking();
2725 
2726  // TODO : Optimize
2727  if (m_lineNumber > 0)
2728  {
2729  m_TextParsingBuffer[m_textInfo.characterInfo[ellipsisIndex].index + 1].unicode = (char)0;
2730 
2731  m_totalCharacterCount = ellipsisIndex + 1;
2732 
2733  GenerateTextMesh();
2734  m_isTextTruncated = true;
2735  return;
2736  }
2737  else
2738  {
2739  ClearMesh();
2740  return;
2741  }
2742  case TextOverflowModes.Page:
2743  if (m_isMaskingEnabled)
2744  DisableMasking();
2745 
2746  // Ignore Page Break, Linefeed or carriage return
2747  if (charCode == 13 || charCode == 10)
2748  break;
2749 
2750  // Return if the first character doesn't fit.
2751  if (i == 0)
2752  {
2753  ClearMesh();
2754  return;
2755  }
2756  else if (previousPageOverflowChar == i)
2757  {
2758  m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode = 0;
2759  m_isTextTruncated = true;
2760  }
2761 
2762  previousPageOverflowChar = i;
2763 
2764  // Go back to previous line and re-layout
2765  i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLineState);
2766 
2767  m_isNewPage = true;
2768  m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
2769  m_lineOffset = 0;
2770  m_maxAscender = 0;
2771  pageAscender = 0;
2772  m_lineNumber += 1;
2773  m_pageNumber += 1;
2774  continue;
2775  case TextOverflowModes.Linked:
2776  if (m_linkedTextComponent != null)
2777  {
2778  m_linkedTextComponent.text = text;
2779  m_linkedTextComponent.firstVisibleCharacter = m_characterCount;
2780  m_linkedTextComponent.ForceMeshUpdate();
2781  }
2782 
2783  // Truncate remaining text
2784  if (m_lineNumber > 0)
2785  {
2786  m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode = (char)0;
2787 
2788  m_totalCharacterCount = m_characterCount;
2789 
2790  // TODO : Optimize as we should be able to end the layout phase here without having to do another pass.
2791  GenerateTextMesh();
2792  m_isTextTruncated = true;
2793  return;
2794  }
2795  else
2796  {
2797  ClearMesh();
2798  return;
2799  }
2800  }
2801  #endregion End Text Overflow
2802 
2803  }
2804  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2805  Profiler.EndSample();
2806  #endif
2807  #endregion Check Vertical Bounds
2808 
2809 
2810  // Handle xAdvance & Tabulation Stops. Tab stops at every 25% of Font Size.
2811  #region XAdvance, Tabulation & Stops
2812  if (charCode == 9)
2813  {
2814  float tabSize = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.tabWidth * m_currentFontAsset.tabSize * currentElementScale;
2815  float tabs = Mathf.Ceil(m_xAdvance / tabSize) * tabSize;
2816  m_xAdvance = tabs > m_xAdvance ? tabs : m_xAdvance + tabSize;
2817  }
2818  else if (m_monoSpacing != 0)
2819  {
2820  m_xAdvance += (m_monoSpacing - monoAdvance + ((characterSpacingAdjustment + m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset) * currentElementScale) + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
2821 
2822  if (char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) || charCode == 0x200B)
2823  m_xAdvance += m_wordSpacing * currentElementScale;
2824  }
2825  else if (!m_isRightToLeft)
2826  {
2827  float scaleFXMultiplier = 1;
2828  if (m_isFXMatrixSet) scaleFXMultiplier = m_FXMatrix.lossyScale.x;
2829 
2830  m_xAdvance += ((m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalAdvance * scaleFXMultiplier * bold_xAdvance_multiplier + characterSpacingAdjustment + m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + glyphAdjustments.xAdvance) * currentElementScale + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
2831 
2832  if (char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) || charCode == 0x200B)
2833  m_xAdvance += m_wordSpacing * currentElementScale;
2834  }
2835  else
2836  {
2837  m_xAdvance -= glyphAdjustments.xAdvance * currentElementScale;
2838  }
2839 
2840 
2841  // Store xAdvance information
2842  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].xAdvance = m_xAdvance;
2843 
2844  #endregion Tabulation & Stops
2845 
2846 
2847  // Handle Carriage Return
2848  #region Carriage Return
2849  if (charCode == 13)
2850  {
2851  m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
2852  }
2853  #endregion Carriage Return
2854 
2855 
2856  // Handle Line Spacing Adjustments + Word Wrapping & special case for last line.
2857  #region Check for Line Feed and Last Character
2858  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2859  Profiler.BeginSample("Process Linefeed");
2860  #endif
2861  if (charCode == 10 || m_characterCount == totalCharacterCount - 1)
2862  {
2863  // Check if Line Spacing of previous line needs to be adjusted.
2864  if (m_lineNumber > 0 && !TMP_Math.Approximately(m_maxLineAscender, m_startOfLineAscender) && m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET && !m_isNewPage)
2865  {
2866  //Debug.Log("Line Feed - Adjusting Line Spacing on line #" + m_lineNumber);
2867  float offsetDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
2868  AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, offsetDelta);
2869  elementDescenderII -= offsetDelta;
2870  m_lineOffset += offsetDelta;
2871  }
2872  m_isNewPage = false;
2873 
2874  // Calculate lineAscender & make sure if last character is superscript or subscript that we check that as well.
2875  float lineAscender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
2876  float lineDescender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
2877 
2878  // Update maxDescender and maxVisibleDescender
2879  m_maxDescender = m_maxDescender < lineDescender ? m_maxDescender : lineDescender;
2880  if (!isMaxVisibleDescenderSet)
2881  maxVisibleDescender = m_maxDescender;
2882 
2883  if (m_useMaxVisibleDescender && (m_characterCount >= m_maxVisibleCharacters || m_lineNumber >= m_maxVisibleLines))
2884  isMaxVisibleDescenderSet = true;
2885 
2886  // Save Line Information
2887  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstCharacterIndex = m_firstCharacterOfLine;
2888  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstVisibleCharacterIndex = m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_firstCharacterOfLine > m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine ? m_firstCharacterOfLine : m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine;
2889  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastCharacterIndex = m_lastCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
2890  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastVisibleCharacterIndex = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine < m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine ? m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine : m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine;
2891 
2892  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].characterCount = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastCharacterIndex - m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstCharacterIndex + 1;
2893  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].visibleCharacterCount = m_lineVisibleCharacterCount;
2894  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.min = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine].bottomLeft.x, lineDescender);
2895  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.max = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].topRight.x, lineAscender);
2896  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].length = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.max.x - (padding * currentElementScale);
