3403  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position.x - lineExtents.min.x) / (lineExtents.max.x - lineExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3404  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position.x - lineExtents.min.x) / (lineExtents.max.x - lineExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3405  break;
3406  }
3407  else // Special Case if Justified is used in Line Mode.
3408  {
3409  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3410  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3411  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3412  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3413  break;
3414  }
3415 
3416  case TextureMappingOptions.Paragraph:
3417  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3418  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3419  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3420  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3421  break;
3422 
3423  case TextureMappingOptions.MatchAspect:
3424 
3425  switch (m_verticalMapping)
3426  {
3427  case TextureMappingOptions.Character:
3428  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = 0; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3429  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = 1; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3430  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = 0; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3431  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = 1; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3432  break;
3433 
3434  case TextureMappingOptions.Line:
3435  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.y - lineExtents.min.y) / (lineExtents.max.y - lineExtents.min.y) + uvOffset;
3436  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.y - lineExtents.min.y) / (lineExtents.max.y - lineExtents.min.y) + uvOffset;
3437  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3438  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3439  break;
3440 
3441  case TextureMappingOptions.Paragraph:
3442  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) / (m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) + uvOffset;
3443  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) / (m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) + uvOffset;
3444  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3445  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3446  break;
3447 
3448  case TextureMappingOptions.MatchAspect:
3449  Debug.Log("ERROR: Cannot Match both Vertical & Horizontal.");
3450  break;
3451  }
3452 
3453  //float xDelta = 1 - (_uv2s[vert_index + 0].y * textMeshCharacterInfo[i].AspectRatio); // Left aligned
3454  float xDelta = (1 - ((characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y + characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y) * characterInfos[i].aspectRatio)) / 2; // Center of Rectangle
3455 
3456  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y * characterInfos[i].aspectRatio) + xDelta + uvOffset;
3457  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x;
3458  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y * characterInfos[i].aspectRatio) + xDelta + uvOffset;
3459  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x;
3460  break;
3461  }
3462 
3463  switch (m_verticalMapping)
3464  {
3465  case TextureMappingOptions.Character:
3466  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = 0; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3467  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = 1; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3468  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = 1; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3469  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = 0; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3470  break;
3471 
3472  case TextureMappingOptions.Line:
3473  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.y - lineInfo.descender) / (lineInfo.ascender - lineInfo.descender); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3474  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.y - lineInfo.descender) / (lineInfo.ascender - lineInfo.descender); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3475  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3476  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3477  break;
3478 
3479  case TextureMappingOptions.Paragraph:
3480  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) / (m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3481  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) / (m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3482  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3483  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3484  break;
3485 
3486  case TextureMappingOptions.MatchAspect:
3487  float yDelta = (1 - ((characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x + characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x) / characterInfos[i].aspectRatio)) / 2; // Center of Rectangle
3488 
3489  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = yDelta + (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x / characterInfos[i].aspectRatio); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3490  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = yDelta + (characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x / characterInfos[i].aspectRatio); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3491  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3492  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3493  break;
3494  }
3495  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3496  Profiler.EndSample();
3497  #endif
3498  #endregion End UV Mapping Options
3499 
3500  // Pack UV's so that we can pass Xscale needed for Shader to maintain 1:1 ratio.
3501  #region Pack Scale into UV2
3502  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3503  Profiler.BeginSample("Pack UV");
3504  #endif
3505  xScale = characterInfos[i].scale * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
3506  if (!characterInfos[i].isUsingAlternateTypeface && (characterInfos[i].style & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold) xScale *= -1;
3507 
3508  switch (canvasRenderMode)
3509  {
3510  case RenderMode.ScreenSpaceOverlay:
3511  xScale *= Mathf.Abs(lossyScale) / canvasScaleFactor;
3512  break;
3513  case RenderMode.ScreenSpaceCamera:
3514  xScale *= isCameraAssigned ? Mathf.Abs(lossyScale) : 1;
3515  break;
3516  case RenderMode.WorldSpace:
3517  xScale *= Mathf.Abs(lossyScale);
3518  break;
3519  }
3520 
3521  // isBold is encoded in the X value and SDF Scale in Y.
3522  //Vector2 vertexData = new Vector2((characterInfos[i].style & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold ? 1 : 0, xScale);
3523  //characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2 = vertexData;
3524  //characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2 = vertexData;
3525  //characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2 = vertexData;
3526  //characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2 = vertexData;
3527 
3528  float x0 = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x;
3529  float y0 = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3530  float x1 = characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x;
3531  float y1 = characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y;
3532 
3533  float dx = (int)x0;
3534  float dy = (int)y0;
3535 
3536  x0 = x0 - dx;
3537  x1 = x1 - dx;
3538  y0 = y0 - dy;
3539  y1 = y1 - dy;
3540 
3541  // Optimization to avoid having a vector2 returned from the Pack UV function.
3542  characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = PackUV(x0, y0); characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = xScale;
3543  characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = PackUV(x0, y1); characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = xScale;
3544  characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = PackUV(x1, y1); characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = xScale;
3545  characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = PackUV(x1, y0); characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = xScale;
3546  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3547  Profiler.EndSample();
3548  #endif
3549  #endregion
3550  break;
3551

3555  break;

3725  // Setup & Handle Underline
3726  #region Underline
3727  #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3728  Profiler.BeginSample("Process Underline & Strikethrough");
3729  #endif
3730  // NOTE: Need to figure out how underline will be handled with multiple fonts and which font will be used for the underline.
3731  bool isUnderline = (m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].style & FontStyles.Underline) == FontStyles.Underline;
3732  if (isUnderline)
3733  {
3734  bool isUnderlineVisible = true;
3735  int currentPage = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].pageNumber;
3736 
3737  if (i > m_maxVisibleCharacters || currentLine > m_maxVisibleLines || (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Page && currentPage + 1 != m_pageToDisplay))
3738  isUnderlineVisible = false;
3739 
3740  // We only use the scale of visible characters.
3741  if (!char.IsWhiteSpace(currentCharacter) && currentCharacter != 0x200B)
3742  {
3743  underlineMaxScale = Mathf.Max(underlineMaxScale, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale);
3744  xScaleMax = Mathf.Max(xScaleMax, Mathf.Abs(xScale));
3745  underlineBaseLine = Mathf.Min(currentPage == lastPage ? underlineBaseLine : k_LargePositiveFloat, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine + font.faceInfo.underlineOffset * underlineMaxScale);
3746  lastPage = currentPage; // Need to track pages to ensure we reset baseline for the new pages.
3747  }
3748 
3749  if (beginUnderline == false && isUnderlineVisible == true && i <= lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex && currentCharacter != 10 && currentCharacter != 13)
3750  {
3751  if (i == lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex && char.IsSeparator(currentCharacter))
3752  { }
3753  else
3754  {
3755  beginUnderline = true;
3756  underlineStartScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale;
3757  if (underlineMaxScale == 0)
3758  {
3759  underlineMaxScale = underlineStartScale;
3760  xScaleMax = xScale;
3761  }
3762  underline_start = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3763  underlineColor = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].underlineColor;
3764  }
3765  }
3766 
3767  // End Underline if text only contains one character.
3768  if (beginUnderline && m_characterCount == 1)
3769  {
3770  beginUnderline = false;
3771  underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3772  underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale;
3773 
3774  DrawUnderlineMesh(underline_start, underline_end, ref last_vert_index, underlineStartScale, underlineEndScale, underlineMaxScale, xScaleMax, underlineColor);
3775  underlineMaxScale = 0;
3776  xScaleMax = 0;
3777  underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3778  }
3779  else if (beginUnderline && (i == lineInfo.lastCharacterIndex || i >= lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex))
3780  {
3781  // Terminate underline at previous visible character if space or carriage return.
3782  if (char.IsWhiteSpace(currentCharacter) || currentCharacter == 0x200B)
3783  {
3784  int lastVisibleCharacterIndex = lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex;
3785  underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastVisibleCharacterIndex].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3786  underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastVisibleCharacterIndex].scale;
3787  }
3788  else
3789  { // End underline if last character of the line.
3790  underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3791  underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale;
3792  }
3793 
3794  beginUnderline = false;
3795  DrawUnderlineMesh(underline_start, underline_end, ref last_vert_index, underlineStartScale, underlineEndScale, underlineMaxScale, xScaleMax, underlineColor);
3796  underlineMaxScale = 0;
3797  xScaleMax = 0;
3798  underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3799  }
3800  else if (beginUnderline && !isUnderlineVisible)
3801  {
3802  beginUnderline = false;
3803  underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3804  underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].scale;
3805 
3806  DrawUnderlineMesh(underline_start, underline_end, ref last_vert_index, underlineStartScale, underlineEndScale, underlineMaxScale, xScaleMax, underlineColor);
3807  underlineMaxScale = 0;
3808  xScaleMax = 0;
3809  underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3810  }
3811  else if (beginUnderline && i < m_characterCount - 1 && !underlineColor.Compare(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i + 1].underlineColor))
3812  {
3813  // End underline if underline color has changed.

4156  protected override Bounds GetCompoundBounds()
4157  {
4158  Bounds mainBounds = m_mesh.bounds;
4159  Vector3 min = mainBounds.min;
4160  Vector3 max = mainBounds.max;
4161 
4162  for (int i = 1; i < m_subTextObjects.Length && m_subTextObjects[i] != null; i++)
4163  {
4164  Bounds subBounds = m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.bounds;
4165  min.x = min.x < subBounds.min.x ? min.x : subBounds.min.x;
4166  min.y = min.y < subBounds.min.y ? min.y : subBounds.min.y;
4167 
4168  max.x = max.x > subBounds.max.x ? max.x : subBounds.max.x;
4169  max.y = max.y > subBounds.max.y ? max.y : subBounds.max.y;
4170  }
4171 
4172  Vector3 center = (min + max) / 2;
4173  Vector2 size = max - min;
4174  return new Bounds(center, size);
4175  }

4251  void UpdateSDFScale(float scaleDelta)
4252  {
4253  if (scaleDelta == 0 || scaleDelta == float.PositiveInfinity)
4254  {
4255  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
4256  OnPreRenderCanvas();
4257  return;
4258  }
4259 
4260  for (int materialIndex = 0; materialIndex < m_textInfo.materialCount; materialIndex ++)
4261  {
4262  TMP_MeshInfo meshInfo = m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex];
4263 
4264  for (int i = 0; i < meshInfo.uvs2.Length; i++)
4265  {
4266  meshInfo.uvs2[i].y *= Mathf.Abs(scaleDelta);
4267  }
4268  }
4269 
4270  // Push the updated uv2 scale information to the meshes.
4271  for (int i = 0; i < m_textInfo.materialCount; i++)
4272  {
4273  if (i == 0)
4274  {
4275  m_mesh.uv2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs2;
4276  m_canvasRenderer.SetMesh(m_mesh);
4277  }
4278  else
4279  {
4280  m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.uv2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].uvs2;
4281  m_subTextObjects[i].canvasRenderer.SetMesh(m_subTextObjects[i].mesh);
4282  }
4283  }
4284  }

4287  // Function to offset vertices position to account for line spacing changes.
4288  protected override void AdjustLineOffset(int startIndex, int endIndex, float offset)
4289  {
4290  Vector3 vertexOffset = new Vector3(0, offset, 0);
4291 
4292  for (int i = startIndex; i <= endIndex; i++)
4293  {
4294  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft -= vertexOffset;
4295  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topLeft -= vertexOffset;
4296  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight -= vertexOffset;
4297  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomRight -= vertexOffset;
4298 
4299  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].ascender -= vertexOffset.y;
4300  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine -= vertexOffset.y;
4301  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].descender -= vertexOffset.y;
4302 
4303  if (m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].isVisible)
4304  {
4305  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertex_BL.position -= vertexOffset;
4306  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertex_TL.position -= vertexOffset;
4307  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertex_TR.position -= vertexOffset;
4308  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertex_BR.position -= vertexOffset;
4309  }
4310  }
